name: HomegearNodeBase::invokeNodeMethod
description: This method is only available within a Node-BLUE node. It invokes a PHP or C++ method defined within another node and can therefore be used for inter-node communication.
signatures: mixed invokeNodeMethod(string nodeId, string methodName, array parameters)

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the node to call the method in.

parameters.name: methodName
parameters.description: The name of the method to call.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: An indexed array with the parameters to pass to the method.

returnValue: Returns the method's return value on success.
